Name: Magic crystals
About the game: 'Magic Crystals' is a fun tower defense game with very unique mechanics - during the game you need to move crystals to the best places for the best defense. Don't forget to upgrade your crystals because enemies are stronger with every new wave! You are an adventurer who has found magical crystals. And with the help of these crystals, you need to stop the hordes of monsters that have awakened in the darkness. To strengthen the crystals, collect runes that will help you create other crystals. For a certain number of runes a cunning fox will help you to collect the runes. Upgrade crystals so they can attack faster and deal more damage. The fate of the world is in your hands! Game Features: Beautiful visuals Interesting gameplay Steam Achievements support Leveling mechanics Cool level bosses
